redirects.title: Portainer
redirects.text: Portainer simplifies container management in Docker, Swarm, Kubernetes, ACI and Edge environments. It's used by software engineers to speed up software deployments, troubleshoot problems and simplify migrations.

redirects.title: Pi-hole
redirects.text: Pi-hole is a Linux network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application which acts as a DNS sinkhole and optionally a DHCP server, intended for use on a private network. It is designed for use on embedded devices with network capability, such as the Raspberry Pi, but it can be used on other machines running Linux, including cloud implementations.
